original: Chronic inflammation is a persistent condition that affects a wide range of individuals with various medical conditions, including end-stage renal disease (ESRD) and those undergoing dialysis treatment. The article "Chronic Inflammation in End-Stage Renal Disease and Dialysis" sheds light on the leading causes of chronic inflammation in individuals with ESRD, the impact of this disease on clinical
